headline: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (MKC): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on McCormick & Company, Incorporated on Stock Analysis Compilation. In this article, we will summarise the bulls’ thesis on MKC. McCormick & Company, Incorporated’s share was trading at $70.32 as of August 8th. MKC’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.50 and 21.14, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
